subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Wednesday’s loss to Oklahoma City at Madison Square Garden, where the team was blown out (again) and the fans booed (again), take a quiz to gauge just how well you know the beleaguered Knicks.
snippet: In the wake of Wednesday’s loss to Oklahoma City at Madison Square Garden, where the team was blown out (again) and the fans booed (again), take a quiz to gauge just how well you know the beleaguered Knicks.
